meanings.definition: Rekeyboarding: the act of typing on a keyboard again
meanings.sent1: After making a mistake, the rekeyboarding helped me correct it.
meanings.sent2: I had to do rekeyboarding to fix the errors in my document.
meanings.sent3: The rekeyboarding task felt like a keyboard puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the keys during the rekeyboarding process.
meanings.sent5: The rekeyboarding session was like a keyboard workout for my fingers.

meanings.definition: Rekeyboarding: to type on a keyboard again
meanings.sent1: I will rekeyboarding the email to ensure it is error-free.
meanings.sent2: She had to rekeyboarding the password due to security reasons.
meanings.sent3: Rekeyboarding the same text repeatedly can be tedious.
meanings.sent4: He rekeyboarding the code to fix the bugs in the program.
meanings.sent5: The writer had to rekeyboarding the entire article after losing the file.

meanings.definition: Rekeyboarding: the process of entering data into a computer using a keyboard again
meanings.sent1: The rekeyboarding of the information was necessary for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: We had to do rekeyboarding of the data after the system crash.
meanings.sent3: The rekeyboarding task felt like a keyboard marathon.
meanings.sent4: Rekeyboarding the details felt like retracing digital footsteps.
meanings.sent5: The rekeyboarding process was like reentering a digital world.
